title: Vehicle sales in the United States 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Vehicles in the x axis and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in the y axis.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is highest at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and lowest at Vehicles Heavy trucks.
There is a difference of 16965.1 between the maximum Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and minimum Vehicles Heavy trucks.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Vehicles, and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in each Vehicles on the y axis.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is highest at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and lowest at Vehicles Heavy trucks.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Vehicles in the x axis and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in the y axis.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is highest at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and lowest at Vehicles Heavy trucks.
There is a difference of 16965.1 between the maximum Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and minimum Vehicles Heavy trucks.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Vehicles, and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in each Vehicles on the y axis.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and lowest at Vehicles Heavy trucks.
The second highest Vehicle retail sales in thousands is appeared to be the Vehicles Light vehicles (total).
There is a difference of 16965.1 between the maximum Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and minimum Vehicles Heavy trucks.

The Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) has the highest Vehicle retail sales in thousands, followed by Light vehicles (total), and Thereof light trucks. Down to the Vehicles Heavy trucks which is the lowest.
The Vehicles Heavy trucks has 1.68 times less Vehicle retail sales in thousands than average.
Summing up the values of all Vehicless, we get total 51954.4.
